textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure the running configuration file includes Authentication Parameter Configured
Ensure the running configuration file includes a non-commented-out 'enableLocalhostAuthBypass: false'
Ensure the running configuration file contents Pattern Match PEMKeyFile (string)
Ensure running configuration file contents Pattern Match CAFile(string)
Ensure running configuration file contents Pattern Match clusterFile (string)
Ensure running configuration file contents Pattern Match clusterAuthMode(string)
Ensure running configuration file contents Pattern Match authenticationMechanisms(string)
Ensure running configuration file contents Pattern Match bindIp (string)
Ensure the running configuration file includes a non-commented-out 'mode: requireSSL'
Ensure the running configuration file includes a non-commented-out 'FIPSMode: true'
Ensure the running configuration file includes a non-commented-out 'auditLog: destination: syslog'
Ensure the running configuration file includes a non-commented-out audit filter value
Ensure the running configuration file includes a non-commented-out 'SystemLog.quiet =False'
Ensure the running configuration file includes a non-commented-out 'systemLog.logAppend=True'
Ensure the running configuration file does not include a non-commented out 'port = 27017'
Ensure the running configuration file includes a non-commented-out 'javascriptEnabled =False'

file_test.comment: Ensure the Key file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'600'
Ensure the database file permissions are set to mongodb:mongodb:'770'
